text: Paul G. Ruggiers (April 29, 1918 – April 8, 1998) was an American literary historian. He was the David Ross Boyd Professor (1964), George Lynn Cross Professor (1972), and Distinguished Professor of Humanities (1979) at the University of Oklahoma. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:1998 deaths Category:University of Oklahoma faculty Category:20th-century American historians Category:Washington & Jefferson College alumni
title: Paul Ruggiers
